paragraphs: Keep watch in front of the temple. We need time to accomplish everything she asked of us, so make sure you pay attention to anything unusual.
If anything suspicious happens, give us the signal. It'll find its way to us.
Most of the fool soldiers don't even know about the entrance above the Mages Guild. We'll leave that open in case any of the team needs to get in or out.
By the time the king's soldiers figure out what's going on, we'll be done with our task and gone. Anyway, stay alert and remain vigilant!
